start.text: I think the schizophrenia just kicked in.
Where are these guys coming from?
Oh, look, it's your friend, Youtube comments.
You gotta destroy the head. That's the only way to kill a politician, it's by shooting them in the head... Wait, we're in spaceships.
These guys look friendly! Look, they're coming over here to say 'hi' to us!
Aaah! Free money! Give me money!
Are we gonna go in and just shoot everything?
Oh look! People that want to be our friends!

start_boss.text: What the f... Uhh... No please.
Oh my god! What the fuck is that?
What the hell, man? Where do you get these things?
Oh, what the hell is this thing?

retreat.text: Let's just leave! Let's just leave!
Let's - let's get out of here.
Run away, don't let 'em get near you!

out_of_missiles.text: I need more missiles. Anyone got more missiles?
I'm all out of the things that go 'boom' and 'explodey'.

engaged.text: Shut up!
Who said I had a dumb face? Was it you? Die!
You're gonna see that I'm really good at single combat.
This is a pro strategy right here.
Get wrecked, dork.
You like the sight of your own blahd?
My PIN number is 1-2-3-4! Come on! I need fifty bucks!
Twenty paces at dawn!
SHARING!
'Ooh, look at me! I think I'm a badass, but I'm not really, 'cause I'm just a little piece of trash!
Hey now, you're a rockstar... go fuck yourself!
Hog killing time!
Get ready to eat lead, dickface.
Frig off!
You got skinny little arms - I could smoke those arms!
I'm sharing bullets with you!
Ah, yes, the grenade rifle! Right arm of the free world!
Shut up!
I'm gonna nail these guys in one shot.
Check this out... YOU DIE!
Here I am! Rock you like a hurricane!
You are being a dick!
We're so sneaky!
You're not very intimidating up there, buddy.
Stop existing!
Here, I'm gonna shoot 'em in the dick.
Eat trinitrotoulene, suckers!
SQWUAA SQWUAA SQUEEDILLY DOODOLY DOODOLY DOO WOOOOOOOO BBR-R-R-R-R-R-R-R-R-R HNNNK HNNNK
Hunting shotgun! Go! Protect me!
Get rekt.
Detras de ti, imbecil!
Pew pew pew pew!
Yee-haa! Yeehaw! Yip yip hoo! Yeehaw! Yehaaa-yiayhoo!
Now we're dialed in.
Hold on to your intestines.
Alright, no, seriously, seriously, look in barrel. Do you see any gum in it?
I'm gonna put you on a C-130, and then I'm gonna [CENSORED]
We'll get this eventually.
Hey, guess what? You're gonna fucking die.
Settle down, we'll talk this out like reasonable individuals!
Let's screw 'em up!
Screw you, buddy!
SUPPRESSING!
Ohhh, sneeeeeak!
I heard from a reliable source that you're about as useful as tits on a radscorpion.
You're worse than the U.S. Marines!
I'm not a murderer! You guys are murderers!
Look how embarrassed this guy is.
You can't just go around taking people's money and shooting at them for no reason.
I realize it's not your fault but you can't shoot at me.

need_help.text: I could use some help over here! Seriously, help!
Fuckin' shit is exploding over here.
Would someone quit screwing around and help me?

pursuing.text: The hunter sets a trap for his prey...
Why do I have to frickin' do everything?

running.text: This was a bad choice. This was all a bad choice!
You know what, let's back off for a second.
Oh my god this is a shitshow!

hull_50.text: Oh, um, hey, I'm out of stimpaks...

hull_30.text: I'm at, like, a third of my hull right now...
I think every single one of my guns is broken.
Oh, I'm hurt. I'm real hurt.
I think that blew off my leg.

death.text: Oh my god, this is the worst...

victory.text: That went well.
Ashes to ashes, dust to dust, we bury these boneheads in the Earth's crust, amen, alright, let's go.
These guys look dead.
Hunting shotgun protected me.
I am a very, very good gun owner.
For the record, I am not this liberal with guns in real life.
Praise be unto me, Lord Death!
I am your Lord and Savior, Death.
Alright, problem solved.
I don't think you get better from death.
Oh, that was... that was complete insanity...
I feel better about all this.
Sorry, I'm just mediocre at best.
It's the best day ever!
Life is so short and fragile...
Okay, that kind of sucked.
The reason I hang out with you is 'cause I value your company.
What frickin' idiots.
It's just kind of funny to be a complete asshole sometimes.
Ok, the fun has been had.
I think everybody survived.
You can check in, but you can never leave.
And they're dead.
Alright, let's go.
We're terrible people.
Oh my god, what a fucking shitshow!
Alright, well, that was interesting.
Nice.
Alright, let's do a quick battlefield assessment here...
